name: The Epic Quest: To find what Xiliqk wants to do.
name_original: The Epic Quest: To find what Xiliqk wants to do.
description: This game was my first time learning MV. It's filled with inside jokes, a really silly sense of plot, the mechanics are both unique and flawed and I love it. The game is sadly unfinished and will likely stay that way however this game is still worth your time at about 2 or so hours of play time. Give it a try and have fun with my silly sound effects, the only thing that will likely stay consistent throughout all of my games.
